name: dialogflowFirebaseFulfillment
description: This is the default fulfillment for a Dialogflow agents using Cloud Functions for Firebase
author: Google Inc.

scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.start: npm run build && firebase serve --only functions:dialogflowFirebaseFulfillment
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions:dialogflowFirebaseFulfillment
